Text:
thanks! as always, your uploads are awesome this week.

i was looking at uncanny x-men 1 variant covers. does anyone happen to know if hastings sells the variants they have as exclusive at a marked-up (high) price, or are they getting variants for customers with a pull-list at their stores?

the reason i ask, hastings is technically the only comic shop in my town ... but i actually buy comics at one of the shops in the big city.
AFAIK They sell them not much over cover price in their retail locations.  Between 5 and 10 bucks depending on the comic.
oh ok. i may check my hastings and get some, it's pretty much the only store in my town that even gets comics (no local comic shop)
